titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

publicationstmt.publisher: Free Library of Philadelphia, Print and Picture Collection

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.repository: Free Library of Philadelphia, Print and Picture Collection

bioghist.p: Among the exemplary collections of the Free Library of Philadelphia is the Print and Picture Collection. Spanning the graphic arts from 1493 to the present time, the Free Library's Fine Art Prints and Photographs collection includes thousands of images. Initially representing only Philadelphia artists, the collection has been extended to include early masters as well as renowned modern printmakers and photographers.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of artist's books. Artists represented in the collection include Alice Austin, Eugene Feldman, Enid Mark, Claire Owen, Maddy Rosenberg, Hedi Kyle, Suzanne Horvitz, Harry Anderson, Claire Van Vliet, Jude Robison, and Tara O'Brien. Artists represented by several titles include Patricia M. Smith, Susan Viguers, and Jill Timm. The collection also contains catalogs of exhibitions of artist's books, including Ruth E. Fine's catalogue raisonne of Janus Press editions.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
